# ChangeLog
## v6.9.2
* Enforce the JWT and JWE token for application

## v6.9.0
* Added JWE validation, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-4901

## v6.8.1
* Added typescript definitions file.

## v6.7.0
* Added JWT validation support, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-4760

## v6.6.2
* Removed logging of missing token error to prevent flagging transaction as bad when more than one type of token is used. When all tokens are missing it will log each error into CAL.

## v6.6.0
* Exposed getTokenDetails via token utils for graphql to use for token validation, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3044

## v6.5.0
* Added: tokenShieldVerificationStatus and tokenShieldVerificationStatus attributes for user token details, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3486

## v6.4.0
* Moved app-token to service-instruments-ebay, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3396

## v6.3.4
* EU payment related changes, support ebay-ets-api-intent, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3454

## v6.3.3
* Added a flag to enable new user token session validation

## v6.3.2
* Fix: @ebay/cache-ebay expiry field asertion fails.

## v6.3.1
* Fix: validation fails for native app, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3386

## v6.3.0
* Added a new token validation for public token references as part of EU payment related changes, validation porject, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3386

## v6.2.0
* Removed service details client and logic as it is deprecated and no longer needed, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/projects/NODE/issues/NODE-3131

## v6.1.4
* Revrted v6.2.5 due to invalid secret found in esams channel for too many apps.

## v6.1.3
* Removed getting secret from service details and enabled appmeta-ebay -> esams -> secret route, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2976

## v6.1.2
* Fix: reply with 403 if both public token and origUserId are in the headers, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2865

## v6.1.1
* Updated dependencies

## v6.1.0
* Switch from short vip to long

## v6.0.4
* Fixed: should first validate as general token and then fallback to scoped token validation, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2370

## v6.0.3
* Fixed: loosing token attributes after being cached on the box, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2195

## v6.0.2
* Corrected error about non-matching scopes

## v6.0.0
* OpenAPI 3.0 support

## v5.0.0
* Major Node.JS Service Stack Release

## v4.0.0
Updated all dependencies to 4.x

## v0.1.8
* Override Client Secret from client detail service with App-Meta App-Secret since CDS will cease to provide client secret.
* Syncing up CHANGELOG version with actual version

## v0.1.4
* Updated dependencies
* Switched to instrument-inc/errors

## v0.1.3
* Updated dependencies

## v0.1.2
* public scope should allow anonymous access

## v0.1.1
* Updated security logic

## v0.1.0
* Initial release
